title.name: Onsut organization
title.subtitle: National association for the advancement of the deaf and hard of earing

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle1:
Onsut Association is a non-profit organization established in 2013, with its main headquarters in Kfar Qara.
The association was founded to serve as a safe reference and resource for people with hearing impairments.
about.subtitle2: Its mission focuses on empowering them, supporting them, and developing their abilities so they can be active and independent members of society.

org.title: About Us
org.paragraph1: Onsut Association for the support of the deaf and hard of hearing is the first association of its kind in the Arab community in the country. It was established in 2013 by Mr. Shadi Eid from the city of Kfar Qara, who has suffered from hearing difficulties since birth. His struggle led him to take the initiative to create a warm home that initially included members of the deaf and hard-of-hearing community from his city, eventually expanding to reach the largest number of deaf and hard-of-hearing individuals from various regions across the country.
org.paragraph2: Today, this warm home has become the largest association in the country within the Arab community supporting deaf and hard-of-hearing individuals. It offers a wide range of services in various fields, which will be detailed in the pages of this humble magazine that we are proud to present to you. This reflects a decade of continuous work, great efforts, and careful, dedicated follow-up to reach the level of excellence we have today at Onsut Association with the deaf and hard-of-hearing community.
org.paragraph3: Onsut Association is distinguished by its inclusiveness, diversity, and uniqueness in everything it offers to the deaf and hard-of-hearing community. The associationâ€™s management does not only ensure the rights of its members or oversee their access to these rights; the entire team works to be a genuine partner to every individual in the community across all aspects of their lives. This includes shaping their personality and identity, enhancing their social status, and enabling them to choose the professional path suitable for their life, aiming for independence and to become active, contributing members of society in the place each person aspires to.
org.achievments: Key Projects and Activities of the Organization
org.achievment1: Training dozens of individuals from the Deaf and Hard of Hearing community to teach sign language to the hearing community across the country
org.achievment2: Training dozens of individuals from the Deaf and Hard of Hearing community to become instructors for the theoretical driving exam
org.achievment3: Winning a tender to open a dedicated community club that serves as a warm home and shared space for the Deaf and Hard of Hearing community to experience diverse activities
org.achievment4: Awareness lectures to educate Deaf individuals about their rights and responsibilities
org.achievment5: Conducting diverse courses and workshops to educate Deaf and Hard of Hearing individuals in various fields and areas
org.achievment6: Organizing educational courses in multiple fields related to the daily lives of the Deaf and Hard of Hearing community
org.achievment7: Organizing local and international recreational and cultural trips to expose Deaf and Hard of Hearing individuals to the world around them
org.achievment8: Hosting an annual event that brings together the Deaf and Hard of Hearing community from different regions and countries, featuring a social, cultural, and recreational program

founder.title: A Word from the Founder
founder.subtitle: I was not like them; they heard with their ears, while I heard with my heart
founder.paragraph: The call of the heart surpasses and overcomes all difficulties, and this call was the first source of inspiration for what we are today at Onsut Association. I began my journey with this dream, as I previously called it, many years ago, taking the first step toward its realization in 2013. It was the greatest initiative for me, which I worked to bring to life and establish.
founder.name: Shadi Eid

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Reach out to us via phone, email, or fax. We're here to help!

support.title: Support Us
support.subtitle: There are many ways to support our mission beyond donations

volunteer.title: Volunteer as a Course Instructor
volunteer.description: If you have knowledge or experience you would like to share, you can volunteer to lead a course or workshop for our members.
points: Teach a short or long-term course
Make a direct impact through education

partnerships.title: Partnerships & Collaborations
partnerships.description: We work with organizations, institutions, and businesses that share our values and want to create positive impact together.

hosting.title: Host a Field Trip
hosting.description: From time to time, we take our members on educational field trips. If you work at a place that can host us, we would love to hear from you.
points: Host a group visit at your workplace
